title: Strategies for Enhancing Learner Engagement and Psychological Well-Being in AI-Based Language Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with AI-Based Tools and Practical Teaching Experience in Elementary Language Education
context.additional_context: Program to enhance language education design competencies using AI tools for in-service elementary practitioners, with digital devices (laptops/tablets) provided for real-time collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three strategies to promote learner engagement when applying AI tools based on Self-Determination Theory (SDT).
Learners can use a 5-item self-assessment tool to measure psychological well-being in AI-based classes.
Learners can apply a feedback framework (based on specificity, relevance, and actionability criteria) to motivate learners in online environments.

resources: AI-based Language Analysis Platform Trial Account

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
